description: Use a repeat 20: loop to walk around the edge of the garden, turning left whenever you find a tulip.
pre:
import random
width_options = [4, 5, 6, 7, 8]
width = random.choice(width_options)
height = 11 - (width-1)
think(0)
RUR.set_world_size(width, height)
RUR.fill_background("grass")
#RUR.add_final_position("house", 1, 1)

RUR.add_object("tulip", width, 1)
RUR.add_object("tulip", width, height)
RUR.add_object("tulip", 1, height)

think(500)
